articles.title: Kim Jong Un Guides Enlarged Meeting of CMC of WPK
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Guides Enlarged Meeting of CMC of WPK
 Pyongyang, April 27 (KCNA) -- An enlarged meeting of the Central Military Commission (CMC) of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) was held under the guidance of Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the WPK, chairman of the CMC of the WPK, first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army (KPA).
					 Present there were members of the CMC of the WPK, executive members of the party committee of the KPA and commanding officers of the services and corps-level units of the KPA.
					
					 The meeting discussed issues arising in further developing the KPA into the powerful Paektusan revolutionary army faithful to the party, the leader, the country and its people.
					
					 It discussed an organizational matter.
					
					 Kim Jong Un set forth important tasks for further developing the KPA and ways to do so. 
					
					 He said it is the requirements of the era and the developing revolution and a basic guarantee for dynamically advancing the Korean revolution to more firmly prepare the KPA politically and ideologically and in military technology.
					
					 He stressed the need to enhance the function and role of the political organs of the KPA if it is to preserve the proud history and tradition of being the army of the party, win one victory after another in the confrontation with the U.S. and creditably perform the mission as a shock force and standard-bearer in building a thriving nation.
					
					 He noted that the KPA political organs should conduct the political work in a fresh and dynamic manner to ensure that military affairs are successfully carried out as intended by the party.
					
					 "It is necessary to focus the party political work, in particular, on rounding off the combat readiness so that all the units and sub-units may make training part of their life and a habit and rule in hearty response to the training-first slogan of the party and thus a strong wind of conducting intensive training just as the anti-Japanese guerrillas did in Mt. Paektu should prevail in the whole army", he emphasized.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un Guides Shelling Drill
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Guides Shelling Drill
 Pyongyang, April 27 (KCNA) -- Supreme Commander of the Korean People's Army (KPA) Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea and first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK, guided a shelling drill of a long-range artillery sub-unit tasked to hit major targets in the southwestern waters on the occasion of the 82nd anniversary of the heroic KPA.
					 He indicated the firing order and method and gave an order to start the drill. Juche artillery pieces opened fire all at once.
					
					 He expressed great satisfaction, saying "All the shells told. They accurately hit the targets."
					
					  He said the artillerymen could hit the targets even under the unfavorable circumstances as they have undergone intensive training under the simulated conditions of a real battle.
					
					 He was very pleased, noting the shelling drill proved successful and the soldiers of the long-range artillery sub-unit fired shells as if they were displaying fireworks to celebrate the army day.
					
					 "Marking the army day, I look back on the glorious path covered by the KPA under the care of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il", he said, adding: "Since the very day of its founding the KPA has remained loyal to the party and the revolution and protected the country and its people as firm as a rock, preserving the shining tradition of the anti-Japanese war".
					
					 Recalling that the KPA has defended the precious socialist system with arms, sharing the destiny with the party for the past several decades, he stressed that it is the great honor and pride for the WPK to have such revolutionary army.
					
					 He highly praised the artillerymen for their feats, noting that all of them who have been trained as crackshots as intended by the party have splendidly adorned the significant army day by hitting all the targets in the shelling drill. He had a photo taken with them.
					
					 He was accompanied by Hwang Pyong So, Ri Yong Gil, Jang Jong Nam and other members of the Central Military Commission of the WPK, executive members of the party committee of the KPA and commanding officers of the services and corps-level units of the KPA.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Greets South African President
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Greets South African President
 Pyongyang, April 27 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, Sunday sent a message of greeting to Jacob Gedleyihlekisa Zuma, president of South Africa, on the occasion of the Day of Freedom, its national day.
					 The message expressed belief that the friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries would grow stronger, wishing the president and people of South Africa greater successes in their work to achieve the stability of the country and its economic development.

articles.title: Challengers to DPRK Will Never Be Pardoned: CPRK Spokesman
articles.content:
Challengers to DPRK Will Never Be Pardoned: CPRK Spokesman
 Pyongyang, April 27 (KCNA) -- The spokesman for the Committee for the Peaceful Reunification of Korea released a statement on Sunday assailing U.S. President Obama's tour of south Korea from April 25 to 26.
					  The statement said: Due to the tragedy of sinking of a ferry the whole land of south Korea looks like a mourner's house. Had Obama have even an iota of ethics and morality, he should have postponed or shelved his trip.  The American master and his servant staged the farce of insulting, threatening and blackmailing the DPRK during the former's criminal tour of south Korea utterly indifferent to the sorrow of south Koreans. This was entirely to serve the purpose of collusion and conspiracy in their campaign against the DPRK.
					
					 What Park did before Obama this time reminds one of an indiscreet girl who earnestly begs a gangster to beat someone or a capricious whore who asks her fancy man to do harm to other person while providing sex to him.
					
					 Through her ugly behavior Park answered with a war the question put by the DPRK if she wants peaceful reunification based on the inter-Korean reconciliation or a war through the confrontation of the social systems, and fully revealed that her policy of "confidence- building process" is just the same policy of confrontation as that pursued by traitor Lee Myung Bak. She, at the same time, declared before the whole world her intention to drive the situation to the worst catastrophe through the confrontation with the DPRK to the last in utter disregard of the north-south relations. 
					
					 She fully met the demands of her master for aggression, keeping mum about the nukes of the U.S. and desperately finding fault with fellow countrymen in the north over their nukes. She thus laid bare her despicable true colors as a wicked sycophant and traitor, a dirty comfort woman for the U.S. and despicable prostitute selling off the nation.
					
					 She visited together with Obama even the "south Korea-U.S. combined forces command" for the first time as a puppet chief executive and went off confrontation hysteria, crying out for "deterrence against the north" and "resolutely countering provocation from it." She even donned a dress unfit for the atmosphere of the mourner's house in the wake of the big tragedy and embarrassedly flattered Obama in a bid to please him, sparking off uproar.
					
					 The anti-DPRK charade staged by Obama and his servant became a laughing stock of world people as it was nothing but an odd burlesque rare to be found in the world.
					
					 The outcome of Obama's south Korean junket clearly proved that the DPRK was entirely just when it judged and determined that it should counter the U.S., the sworn enemy, by force only, not just talking, and should finally settle accounts with it through an all-out nuclear showdown. This, at the same time, only hardens the will and resolution of the DPRK to keep to the road chosen by it. Park's true colors and ulterior motive were brought to daylight. 
					
					 There is no remedy for Park and there is nothing to expect from her as far as the inter-Korean relations are concerned as long as she remains a boss of Chongwadae.
					
					 She is steeped in sycophancy and treachery and confrontation with compatriots in the north. Her preoccupation is to realize the dream of confrontation of the social systems. 
					
					 Genes remain unchanged. Needless to say, her present behavior suggests that her fate will be just the same as that of her father Park Chung Hee who met a miserable death after being forsaken by his master and public while crying out for "unification by prevailing over communism" and "unification by stamping out communism". 
					
					 The DPRK will never pardon anyone who dares challenge its dignity, social system and its line of simultaneously developing the two fronts, the statement warned.

articles.title: Foreigners Pay Tribute to Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Foreigners Pay Tribute to Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
 Pyongyang, April 27 (KCNA) -- The participants in the 29th meeting of general directors of the Organization of Railways Cooperation, members of the friendship visiting group of the China National Tourism Administration and other foreign guests visited the Kumsusan Palace of the Sun on Sunday.
					 The guests paid high tribute to the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il.
					
					 At the halls where Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il lie in state, the guests made a bow to them.
					
					 They went round the halls where orders the Generalissimos received are on display and the halls which house cars, an electric car, a boat and train coaches used by them during their field guidance and foreign tours till the last moments of their lives.
					
					 They made entries in the visitor's book.

articles.title: Meeting of General Directors of Organization of Railways Cooperation Held
articles.content:
Meeting of General Directors of Organization of Railways Cooperation Held
 Pyongyang, April 27 (KCNA) -- The 29th Meeting of General Directors of the Organization of Railways Cooperation was held here from April 24 to 27.
					 Present there were the delegation of the Committee of the Organization of Railways Cooperation and delegations of railways of the DPRK, Russia, China, Latvia, Hungary, Mongolia, Belarus, Azerbaijan, Ukraine, Estonia, Vietnam, Kazakhstan, Poland and other countries.
					
					 Jon Kil Su, minister of Railways, made a congratulatory speech at the meeting.
					
					 He said he was pleased to meet here members of delegations of different countries.
					
					 He referred to the achievements made in the railway transport field of the DPRK in recent years.
					
					 He expressed expectation that the ever-growing cooperation among member nations of the Organization of Railways Cooperation would be conducted more closely with the meeting as a momentum.
					
					 The meeting reviewed the work of the Committee of the Organization of Railways Cooperation including freight and passenger transport for 2013.
					
					 It also discussed the functions of the leadership of the committee, the period of the calling of the next meeting and its place and other working problems.
					
					 A protocol was adopted at the meeting.

articles.title: DPRK Take First Place at 7th Asian Taekwon-Do Championship
articles.content:
DPRK Take First Place at 7th Asian Taekwon-Do Championship
 Pyongyang, April 27 (KCNA) -- DPRK players took the first place in country standing by winning 5 trophy cups, 25 gold medals and 4 silver medals at the 7th Asian Taekwon-Do Championship held in Nepal.
					 They placed the first at senior men's and women's team events, men's and women's team pattern competitions, team sparring matches and team special techniques matches.
					
					 Ra Kyong Hun and Pak Mi Hyang received man's and woman's technical prizes of the championship.
					
					 The championship brought together ace players from 20 countries and regions.

articles.title: DPRK Proves Successful in Archery World Cup
articles.content:
DPRK Proves Successful in Archery World Cup
 Pyongyang, April 27 (KCNA) -- The Archery World Cup Stage 1 is under way in Shanghai, China from April 22.
					 The event brought together more than 300 archers from at least 40 countries and region. 
					
					 The DPRK team defeated the U.S. team 5 to 4 in the recurve women's team eliminations on April 25 by displaying the Juche-oriented strategy and technique they acquired through everyday training.
					
					 The DPRK team also trounced the Ukrainian rival 6 to 2 in the quarter finals.

articles.title: US Policy of Strength Will Bring It Destruction: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
US Policy of Strength Will Bring It Destruction: Rodong Sinmun
 Pyongyang, April 27 (KCNA) -- If the U.S. persistently pursues the policy of strength on the Korean peninsula, it will get disgrace and destruction only, Rodong Sinmun Sunday says in an article.
					 The article goes on:
					
					 The nearly two month-long Key Resolve and Foal Eagle, joint military drills frantically staged by the U.S. and south Korean puppets, caused serious consequences. The situation on the peninsula plunged into a catastrophic phase again as we had warned. The bud for improving the north-south relations and detente that began to develop along with the spring season was nipped out.
					
					 The joint military drills were comprehensive ones which set sky, land, sea, space, computer network and mentality of people as war fields and mobilized all branches of arms and services of the U.S.-led allied forces including nuclear strike means and psychological plot-breeders. They were not defensive ones, but a preliminary war and nuclear test war, which were escalated aiming at a surprise attack and complete occupation of important targets of the DPRK. 
					
					 The U.S. botched the peace process on the Korean peninsula by kicking up such nuclear racket. This provided a pretext for armed buildup in Northeast Asia and Asia-Pacific region. 
					
					 The U.S. in collusion with south Korean puppet forces persist in the nuclear racket against the DPRK. This will compel the DPRK to further strengthen the political and military offensive to cope with it. 
					
					 If the U.S. escalates the political and military oppression of the DPRK in disregard of its warning, the DPRK will take stronger measures for self-defence. 
					
					 The groups of Park Geun Hye should clearly understand that their desperate efforts to bring a fratricidal war by siding with the U.S. are as foolish an act as crawling into a pigsty with pumpkins on one's head.

articles.title: Preemptive Attack Is Not Monopoly of US: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
Preemptive Attack Is Not Monopoly of U.S.: Rodong Sinmun
 Pyongyang, April 27 (KCNA) -- The United States plans to deploy two more destroyers equipped with ballistic missiles in Japan by 2017, while crying out for "countering missiles from north Korea".
					 Meanwhile, the U.S. and the south Korea reportedly agreed to systematically carry out the "tailored deterrence strategy" against the "asymmetric threat from north Korea" which allegedly uses weapons of mass destruction including nukes and missiles and small drones.
					
					 Rodong Sinmun Sunday says in a commentary in this regard:
					
					 The U.S. is set to prevent detente on the Korean peninsula and improvement of the inter-Korean relations and to justify its armed buildup aimed to dominate the Asia-Pacific region by making the "threat" and "provocation" by the DPRK a fait accompli.
					
					 The U.S. has become undisguised in its intention to steadily intensify the military provocation, wrecking peace and stability in the peninsula and its vicinity.
					
					 The U.S., together with its allies, is calling for counteraction while claiming that the non-existent infiltration of drone. It is aimed to create a pretext for a preemptive attack on the DPRK.
					
					  The U.S. moves to establish the missile defence system is to make a preemptive missile attack, not for defence.
					
					 The U.S., however, can never stop the DPRK's just measure for self-defence although it introduces various strategies.
					
					 The DPRK does not want a war but will never show mercy for those hurting it.
					
					 A preemptive attack is not a monopoly of the U.S.

articles.title: US Is Not Entitled to Talk about Human Rights: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
US Is Not Entitled to Talk about Human Rights: Rodong Sinmun
 Pyongyang, April 27 (KCNA) -- Of late, the present U.S. chief executive and high-ranking officials of the U.S. have vied with each other to float the story that the DPRK has serious "human rights issue," kicking off a hysteria by mobilizing those following them.  They also talked rubbish that the world should try to settle the issue and that they would spare no support for the "human rights".
					 The U.S. aim is to justify its interference in others' internal affairs and armed invasion.
					
					 Rodong Sinmun Sunday says this in a commentary. 
					
					 It goes on:
					
					 The U.S. is not entitled to talk about the human rights as it harshly abuses human rights through interference in others' internal affairs and wars of aggression in different parts of the world.
					
					 Looking back upon history, the U.S. human rights campaign has been used as a mean for interfering in others' internal affairs and bringing down their social systems, and as a prelude to wars of aggression.
					
					 It is a bitter lesson and truth of history that a catastrophe surely follows the U.S. human rights racket.
					
					 The U.S. "human rights" campaign is not a temporary tactic but a long-term strategy.
					
					 The main target of the U.S. human rights offensive is independent countries standing against imperialism and those trying to get rid of their stand of kowtowing to the U.S.
					
					 In particular, the U.S. "human rights" offensive against the DPRK is unprecedented in its stubbornness, viciousness and persistence.
					
					 The U.S. vicious "human rights" offensive reminds the DPRK of the truth of history that human rights precisely mean state sovereignty and without it there will be neither human rights nor the right to existence.
					
					 The state sovereignty is defended with powerful strength for self-defence, not with words. It is the only way of ensuring human rights to counter enemies with powerful strength.
					
					 The more the U.S. intensifies its moves to isolate and stifle the DPRK under the pretext of "human rights", the more the DPRK will increase the national capacity for self-defence to cope with it.

articles.title: Prospect of Korean Relations Depends on Park Geun Hye: Minju Joson
articles.content:
Prospect of Korean Relations Depends on Park Geun Hye: Minju Joson
 Pyongyang, April 27 (KCNA) -- The prospect of the north-south relations entirely depends on the attitude of Park Geun Hye as stated in the open questionnaire of the Committee for the Peaceful Reunification of Korea (CPRK), says Minju Joson Sunday in a commentary. 
					 It goes on:
					
					 The south Korean chief executive Park Geun Hye has so far raised the "confidence-building process" as her "policy toward the north", claiming that "the south-north relations should be mended and the foundation for unification laid by building confidence". 
					
					 But what she had done under the signboard of "confidence-building process" was treacherous acts of pushing the inter-Korean relations to a catastrophe by fostering distrust, not building confidence.
					
					 The Korean nation has not yet achieved the cause of reunification. It is not because that there is neither a plan nor a preparatory committee. 
					
					 The Korean nation has the historic July 4 joint statement, the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration, great programmes and landmarks for reunification common to the nation. 
					
					 What matters is that the present south Korean conservative ruling forces led by Park Geun Hye have been opposed to them. That is why the north-south relations have been deteriorated and national reunification has not been achieved. 
					
					 Park should not resort to cunning and deceptive tricks any longer but give clear answers to the 10-point questionnaire of the CPRK. 
					
					 She has not replied to the questionnaire though some days passed since the open questionnaire was announced. This only reveals her traitorous nature for confrontation.
					
					 Park had better clarify her clear stand and attitude, bearing in mind that not only the Korean people but world peace-loving people are waiting for her answers to the open questionnaire of the CPRK.

articles.title: S. Korean Students Suicide Themselves
articles.content:
S. Korean Students Suicide Themselves
 Pyongyang, April 27 (KCNA) -- Cases of suicides of students occurred in Kwangju, south Korea, according to Voice of People, an internet paper of south Korea.
					 A student of a secondary school in Nam District, Kwangju city on April 22 jumped himself from an apartment house to suicide himself, unable to bear violence at the school. Earlier, three students of secondary and high schools jumped themselves to suicide one after another in one week in Kwangju, sparking off a big furor.
					
					 The suicide of students is an inevitable product caused by south Korean society where the hope for the future, ambition and human rights are being ruthlessly trampled down.

articles.title: S. Korean Regime's Anti-Popular Rule under Fire
articles.content:
S. Korean Regime's Anti-Popular Rule under Fire
 Pyongyang, April 27 (KCNA) -- The Solidarity for Democracy, People's Life, Peaceful Reunification and Sovereignty of south Korea released a statement on April 23 in denunciation of the puppet regime's anti-popular rule.
					 South Korea has been reduced into a theatre of lamentation and screams of people owing to the Park Geun Hye regime, the statement said.
					
					 It branded the Park regime as an incompetent and worthless regime, a regime which conceals the truth whenever a case occurs, a deceptive regime which shifts blame onto an individual once its falsity is disclosed, a regime evading responsibility and a group of the worst cowardly and corrupt bureaucrats.
					
					 The people have been driven to death, being maltreated like animals but the regime has done nothing for them, it deplored, pointing out that the wellbeing "commitments" made by Park during the election has long been deleted and modified in the policies of the regime.
					
					 If there is a thing done by the present regime, it is only that the regime has bedeviled the people's living and tries to completely sell the life of people to big businesses through privatization of public sectors, it noted, adding:
					
					 The critical situation is prevailing on the Korean peninsula due to the authorities' extreme policy of confrontation with the north.
					
					 Today's south Korean society is bereft of even humanity in the vortex of witch-hunting operations against the "forces following the north".
					
					 South Korea is sinking and its present regime has no future, the statement stressed.

articles.title: Park Geun Hye Censured by S. Korean Internet Paper
articles.content:
Park Geun Hye Censured by S. Korean Internet Paper
 Pyongyang, April 27 (KCNA) -- An editorial titled "President is troublemaker" was posted by the south Korean internet paper Voice of People on April 23.
					 The editorial said Park chaired a meeting at Chongwadae in connection with the ferry Sewol sinking accident but she only gave a unilateral instruction, far from discussing measures for the accident, and neither made a responsible apology nor reflected herself there.
					
					 It went on:
					
					 At the meeting Park cried out for seriously punishing officials concerned. It is astonishing that she and Chongwadae were excluded from punishment.
					
					 The chief culprit of the accident is the "president". However, she failed to reflect herself and make an apology for the accident but called for seriously punishing officials concerned only. It is, indeed, very wrong.
					
					 It is a trite-method employed by a dictator to conceal the essence of the problem and evade the responsibility for it by diverting elsewhere the public distrust and resentment.
					
					 Incompetence of the "government" precisely means the incompetence of the "president". Park can never evade her responsibility.

articles.title: Japans' Suppression of Chongryon Protested by Koreans in Russia
articles.content:
Japans' Suppression of Chongryon Protested by Koreans in Russia
Pyongyang, April 27 (KCNA) -- The United Confederation of Koreans in Russia sent a protest letter on April 19 to the Japanese ambassador to Russia denouncing the Japanese authorities for cracking down on the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon).
					 The letter recalled that the delegation of the Committee for Promoting Korea's Reunification visited the Central Standing Committee of Chongryon in Tokyo in 1992.
					
					 Going round various units of Chongryon including the Korean Hall and Korean University, members of the delegation felt the national dignity and honor, seeing Chongryon officials and Koreans in Japan preserving and glorifying the Korean language and national culture despite the moves of the Japanese authorities to obliterate the Korean nation, the letter said.
					
					 The Korean Hall of Chongryon, in particular, is the place where Koreans in Japan are cherishing national self-esteem, it held.
					
					 It denounced the Japanese authorities for having recently made an illegal decision to sell the Korean Hall, ceaselessly discriminating and cracking down on Chongryon officials.
					
					 The United Confederation of Koreans in Russia protests against the suppression of Chongryon, it said and urged the Japanese authorities to respect international law and human rights and stop the moves to deprive Chongryon of its right.

articles.title: Japans' Suppression of Chongryon Censured in Different Countries
articles.content:
Japans' Suppression of Chongryon Censured in Different Countries
 Pyongyang, April 27 (KCNA) -- A Russian party and Czech organization denounced the Japanese authorities for their crackdown on the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon).
					 The Maritime Territorial Regional Committee of the Communist Party of the Russian Federation in a statement on April 19 said:
					
					 The Tokyo District Court made a criminal decision on the sale of the land and building of the Korean Hall of Chongryon, stunning the world.
					
					 The decision makes one see through the Japanese authorities' aim to stamp out the culture of Koreans in Japan and ostracize them from social life.
					
					 The Japanese authorities should roll back at once the illegal decision and come out for improving the relations with the DPRK with good intention.
					
					 The Paektusan Czech-Korean Friendship Association in a statement on April 20 said:
					
					 We protest against Japan's undemocratic act.
					
					 The Japanese authorities finally made a decision on allowing the sale of the Korean Hall of Chongryon in the wake of their moves to obliterate Chongryon by employing all means.
					
					 Is there any legal ground for them to make such an absurd decision?
					
					 This is another illegal act perpetrated by Japan which committed untold crimes against the Korean people after invading Korea.
					
					 We vehemently condemn the Japanese authorities for resorting to every possible means and methods to disturb the efforts for improving the relations between the peoples of the DPRK and Japan.

articles.title: Exploits of Kim Il Sung Praised by Foreigners
articles.content:
Exploits of Kim Il Sung Praised by Foreigners
 Pyongyang, April 27 (KCNA) -- Meetings took place in Uganda and India and remembrance meetings in Venezuela and Zimbabwe on April 13 and 14 on the occasion of the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung. 
					 On display at the venues of the events were photos documenting the revolutionary careers of the President and leader Kim Jong Il and their exploits and revolutionary activities of Marshal Kim Jong Un. 
					
					 Also displayed there were works of the peerlessly great men of Mt. Paektu and other books and photos showing successes achieved by the service personnel and people of the DPRK. 
					
					 Personages of the Uganda National Resistance Movement and the Ugandan National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea praised Kim Il Sung as the father of socialist Korea, invincible and iron-willed commander, world elder statesman in the 20th century and close friend of the Ugandan people, paying the highest tribute to him. 
					
					 The exploits of the President for the human cause of independence will shine for all ages, they added. 
					
					 The chairman of the Juche Philosophy Study Committee of India and other speakers said that Kim Il Sung was the great man unprecedented in the history as he personified all personalities and qualifications at the highest level to be possessed of by a leader. He was not only the leader of a country but also the benevolent father of the Korean people, they added. 
					
					 The chief of the Venezuelan Group for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism said that Kim Il Sung was the peerlessly great man and iron-willed commander who led the bloody great war against Japan to victory and liberated the country and humbled U.S. imperialism, which boasted of being "the strongest" in the world, in the Fatherland Liberation War. 
					
					 Messages of greeting to Kim Jong Un were adopted at the events held in India and Venezuela.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung's Exploits Introduced by Foreign Newspapers
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung's Exploits Introduced by Foreign Newspapers
 Pyongyang, April 27 (KCNA) -- Foreign newspapers carried articles praising President Kim Il Sung's exploits between April 11 and 16 on the occasion of his birth anniversary.
					 The Syrian newspaper Al Nour said in an article titled "Great man Kim Il Sung, on the occasion of the 102nd birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung who is always alive":
					
					 Kim Il Sung performed great exploits to be specially recorded in the history of human thought.
					
					 The President was the great leader for the cause of global independence.
					
					 His life was one of love for the people and devotion to them.
					
					 The revolutionary cause of Juche pioneered by the President and developed by leader Kim Jong Il is being successfully carried forward by HE Kim Jong Un.
					
					 The Korean people will surely realize the cause of building a thriving socialist nation under his leadership.
					
					 A Bangladeshi paper and an Angolan newspaper dealt with the revolutionary life and exploits of the peerlessly great man under titles of "Kim Il Sung, shining august name" and "Eternal sun".
					
					 The Egyptian paper Al-Misaiya said in an article titled "Father of people" that Kim Il Sung devoted his all to bringing the happiness to the people, regarding it as greatest pleasure to serve them.
					
					 The paper said that Kim Il Sung's tender-hearted image as the father of the people will always be cherished in the hearts of progressive humankind. -0-

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Work Off Press in Congo
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Work Off Press in Congo
 Pyongyang, April 27 (KCNA) -- Marshal Kim Jong Un's work "Let Us March Forward Dynamically towards Final Victory, Holding Higher the Banner of Songun" was brought out in booklet by Akram Publishing House in Brazzaville of Congo on the occasion of the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.
					 The work, a speech made by Kim Jong Un at the military parade to celebrate the 100th birth anniversary of Kim Il Sung on April 15, Juche 101 (2012), says the 100 year-long history of Kim Il Sung's nation clearly proves the immutable truth that outstanding leaders assure the dignity and prosperity of the country and the nation.
					
					 It sets forth the tasks to be fulfilled to glorify the dignity of Songun Korea for all ages and successfully carry out the cause of building a thriving socialist nation.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un dirige reunion ampliada de la CMC del PTC
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un dirige reunion ampliada de la CMC del PTC
Pyongyang, 27 de abril (ACNC) -- Tuvo lugar la reunion ampliada de la Comision Militar Central (CMC) del Partido del Trabajo de Corea bajo la direccion del Mariscal Kim Jong Un, Primer Secretario del PTC, Presidente de la CMC del PTC, Primer Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea (EPC).
					Asistieron a la ocasion los miembros de la CMC del PTC, los miembros ejecutivos del Comite del PTC en el EPC y los miembros directivos de tipos de ejercito y de unidades a nivel de cuerpo.
					
					El conclave discutio los problemas que se presentan para fortalecer y desarrollar el EPC como potente ejercito revolucionario inspirado en el temple del monte Paektu, infinitamente fiel al Partido y el lider, a la patria y el pueblo, y el problema de organizacion.
					
					El Mariscal aclaro las tareas y remedios importantes para intensificar mas el EPC.
					
					Senalo que preparar con mas firmeza el EPC tanto en lo ideo-politico como en lo militar-tecnico es la demanda de la epoca y la revolucion en desarrollo y es la garantia fundamental para adelantar con vigor nuestra revolucion.
					
					Hay que elevar mas la funcion y el papel de los organos politicos del EPC para que nuestro ejercito mantenga la gloriosa historia y la tradicion del ejercito del Partido, salga siempre victorioso en la confrontacion antiyanqui y cumpla con su mision de vanguardia y abanderado en la construccion de un Estado Prospero, destaco.
					
					Dijo que los organos politicos del EPC deben realizar de manera innovadora y ofensiva la labor politica para que los asuntos militares se lleven a cabo conforme a la intencion del Partido.
					
					Sobre todo, hay que concentrar la labor politica del Partido a completar los preparativos del combate, de modo que todas las unidades y subunidades se acostumbren siempre a los ejercicios en pleno acato a la consigna del Partido de dar prioridad al entrenamiento y reine todo el ejercito un fuerte ambiente de entrenamiento del monte Paektu.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un dirige ejercicio de fuego de subunidad de artilleria de largo alcance
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un dirige ejercicio de fuego de subunidad de artilleria de largo alcance
Pyongyang, 27 de abril (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un, Primer Secretario del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Primer Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, dirigio el entrenamiento de fuego de la subunidad de largo alcance, encargada de la mision de ataque a los importantes objetos enemigos en la superficie del mar sudoeste, en ocasion del 82o aniversario de la fundacion del heroico EPC.
					El Mariscal definio el turno y el metodo de tiro y dio la orden de disparar.
					
					Al instante, los canones de marca Juche abrieron bocas.
					
					El Mariscal expreso gran satisfaccion diciendo que los artilleros dispararon bien y dieron exactos golpes a los blancos y agrego que los artilleros lo hicieron muy bien aun en medio de condiciones desfavorables porque realizaron en los dias cotidianos los ejercicios en maximo nivel pensando en el combate real.
					
					Asevero que el entrenamiento de tiro de hoy resulto exitoso y que los artilleros de esta subunidad dispararon salvas en celebracion del dia de la fundacion del EPC.
					
					Recordo la trayectoria gloriosa que ha venido recorriendo el EPC bajo la direccion del Presidente Kim Il Sung y el Dirigente Kim Jong Il y destaco que el EPC fue infinitamente fiel al Partido y la revolucion manteniendo desde primeros dias de su fundacion hasta la fecha la tradicion brillante de la lucha antijaponesa y salvaguardo con firmeza la patria y el pueblo.
					
					Diciendo que el EPC compartio el destino siempre con el Partido y defendio con armas el precioso regimen socialista durante varios decenios, hizo hincapie en que es el gran orgullo y honor del Partido contar con tal ejercito revolucionario.
					
					Los artilleros, preparados como los certeros conforme a la voluntad del Partido, sonaron canonazos de tiro certero en el entrenamiento de fuego, gracias a lo cual coronaron con brillantez el dia de la fundacion del EPC, senalo.
					
					Aprecio altamente las proezas de los militares y se fotografio junto a ellos.
					
					Le acompanaron en la ocasion Hwang Pyong So, Ri Yong Gil, Jang Jong Nam y otros miembros de la Comision Militar Central del PTC, los miembros ejecutivos del Comite del PTC en el EPC y miembros directivos de tipos de ejercito y unidades a nivel de cuerpo.
